entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Highvale
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:49 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tomahawk 12:00 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: -11.9°C
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.5°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries or freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries or freezing rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:48 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
